seg.method: segmentAllSpots

scale.nuc: 48
scale.cyt: 24

thresh.nuc.peak: 0.0007
thresh.nuc.mask: 0.00025
thresh.cyt: 0.0001
thresh.cyt.global: 0.005

nuc.area.min: 100
nuc.area.max: 3000
cyt.area.max: 15000

border.crop: 150

thumbnail.crop: 724, 1324, 724, 1324
thumbnail.resize.width: 400

seg.write.cal: TRUE
seg.write.cal.view: TRUE
seg.write.seg: TRUE
seg.write.contours: TRUE
